She laid Penny on a changing table and started to remove her diaper. Penny blushed dark red as her mother wiped her bottom and privates. Her mother sprinkled the powder over her privates and bottom. When she was done she taped up her fresh new diaper. She blushed as her mother picked her up again.

11511221.content:
Penny sighed as she walked home from school, which made her full of relief. It was getting harder and harder everyday. She looked and saw a couple of babies playing in the park. She kinda missed that, where life was easy, no one bothers you, not having to worry about a bunch of things. She stopped when she kicked something. She looked down and saw an Arabian lamp, she picked it up and dusted it off, causing smoke to surround her. The smoke disappear revealing an anthromorphic wolf in Arabian outfit. He was on the cellphone

"Dude this girl was playing dirty." The wolf stated, he looked down and saw Penny looking at him. "I'll call you back."

"Who are you?" Penny asked.

"I am, GD Genie of the lamp. You have rubbed my lamp making me grant you three wishes." GD stated,

"GD?" Penny questioned.

"GD's short for G-Dog. Anyway what's your wish?" GD asked,

"You grant wishes?" Penny began to think about her wish. "I wish my life was easy like a baby's."

15111.content: Trudy visits a babysitter to see if she's the right fit. However, this visit soon becomes a babysitting gig in its own right, as Trudy is babysat by the babysitter. She becomes a baby, and will need future babysitter visits.
15111.title: How's it happen

choices: Trudy regresses after the changing, when she's given milky wilky
151111.content:
Trudy drove up to the babysitter's house. The babystter's name was Amy Youth, and seemed pretty reputable online.

Trudy got out of her minivan, walking up to the house in her normal clothes. (A greenish yellow formal attire with tan pants)

Her hair was styled to profession; she intended for this to be a very professional visit.

She knocked on the door and within seconds it opened, revealing a blonde white girl in her mid 20s. Amy wore a pink dress with flowers, similar to that of a 1950s housewife.

Amy was very enthusiastic "Hi there! You must be Mrs. Proud, please come in?"

Trudy stumbled to reply, never had she met someone so happy "A-alright."

Once Amy closed the door "So, you had a couple quick questions?"

"Y-yes. Can we sit?"

"Oh sure" Amy responded. They went to the kitchen and situated. Amy cut in "So, shoot"

"K, so.. what is your experience with babysitting?"

"Haha, I've got tons of experience. Over 15 years. I started babysitting babies since I was ten. My baby brothers needed all the assistance."

"Hmm.. what is your schedule?"

"Any day any time."

"Wow, and do you have any specific practices."

"Nope" Amy smiled "I make sure your babies are treated exactly how you like."

"This sounds great! Just, how much do your services cost?"

"The whole expense is free."

"Free?!"

"Exactly, you got it."

"Wow.. I kinda want to pay you something for the first week."

"Whatever you like, but there is more I planned for your visit."

"What else is there?"

"I want to show you the baby station."

"Oh, that's unnecessary, but sure."

The two walked upstairs, They walked side by side, but soon enough Amy started gently patting Trudy's butt in mid walk. Trudy noticed, but didn't say anything. This babysitter was just too perfect to blow it on that.

They eventually got to the room, and it beautiful. The carpet was light pink and soft. Toys were neatly packed inside a baby trunk. There was even a book shelf filled with books for baby learning. Next to it was a rocking chair, pink baby bag, and stroller. The baby bag already had pacifiers, spare diapers, and any other baby necessities. The changing table was colored pink and white, had neatly stacked diapers on top, and in the bottom had powders, wipes, and lotions. Surprisingly, there was only one crib.

Amy interjected "So... I was patting your butt on the way up and I think it would be helpful to go through my training program."

"Wh-why were you? Oh, nevermind.. Just what is this training program."

Amy smiled, hiding her sinister-ness "Its a program where you see through first hand experience how I care for my patients. I want you to know, I have this under control. That's why I patted your butt; it was to see your if you made a stinky."

This was the last straw, Trudy would take a stand. "A stinky?! I'm grown woman, I don't need you to check my butt. I don't wear diapers! As for this program, I'm uninterested."

Amy oddly raised her voice "Now listen up young lady! I am sorry if your culture taught you differently. That doesn't change anything, I insist you let me show you or I won't watch over your babies."

This was a choke hold. Trudy needed a babysitter for the twins, and the offer was too good to let down. Trudy gave a big sigh "Ok, lets get this over with."

Amy clapped gleefully and patted Trudy's head "Good girl. Glad you decided right. Now, lets check your diaper shall we. Give me one second."

Trudy was beginning to rethink this, but it was too late to back out. Amy picked her up and placed her on the changing table. She then removed Trudy's clothes, above the waist first. First Trudy's jacket, then her shirt, then her bra. Afterwards, she slid off Trudy's pants, leaving the mother almost completely naked.

Trudy started to cry of embarrassment, but Amy stopped this with a pacifier. Strangely, Trudy had a reaction similar to that of a baby. She was suckling on it unable to stop. Her cheeks still burned red from fear. "Now now, Little Trudy.. so what if you peed your diaper." This was a lie, but Trudy was so scared she took it at face value.

"Don't worry my baby. A quick changing should help!"
151111.title: Mrs. Proud becomes Wittle Trudy Wody

choices: Penny takes her mother away, but can't turn her back
Penny loves her mothers new form and plays with her
1511111.content:
Amy removed Trudy's panties, which to her surprise DID have a pee stain on them.

Before Trudy could react, Amy raised her legs and heap of baby powder was dumped on Trudy's butt. She didn't realize that this stuff was special. It quickly started regressing her to an infant. Then Amy slid a diaper underneath and lowered an ever shrinking butt onto the small diaper. Within a minute Trudy was the tender age of 1, just the right size for this white cushion-y diaper. Amy lowered Trudy's legs down and finally strapped the diaper in place. For extra measure, Amy put on a mini greenish yellow shirt, similar to the one Trudy usually wore.

"ALL DONE! Here, let me show you my awesome baby." Amy carried Trudy over to a mirror.

Trudy was AMAZED and scared. She let go of the pacifier and started crying at the top of her lungs.

"WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!"

Then Penny opened the door.
1511111.title: Trudy regresses during the changing

info.brief_description: Put one of your fave proud family in diapers
info.description:
Put one of your fave Proud Family Characters in diapers

Rules
-No character death
-Regression is fine
-No godmodding(if that's possible on here)
-The gross stuff should stay in diapers.
-Embarrass the characters to the max if you like.
